text: Sir Ambrose Dundas Flux Dundas KCIE, CSI (b.1899-d.1973) was the second chief commissioner of Balochistan (Pakistan) from 4 October 1947 - 8 April 1948, and the second governor of the North West Frontier Province from 9 April 1948 - 16 July 1949. Dundas was Lieutenant Governor of the Isle of Man from 1952 to 1959. Category:1899 births Category:1973 deaths Category:Colonial officials of British India Category:Isle of Man Category:Knights Commander of the Order of the Indian Empire Category:Order of the Star of India
title: Ambrose Dundas Flux Dundas
